page.title: 17Wootton village fair
page.content: The village fair is where everyone in the village gets together and has a nice time. It happens every summer. It starts with a parade through the village. Children dress up to go on the floats. There is a competition for the best decorated float and the one that wins leads the parade. This year the Memorial Hall Playgoup came first and our school came second. St. Mary's Playgoup came third and the cubs came fourth. Amanda Bird came first in the drawing competiton with a nice picture of a hegehog. My sister won a toy dog for guessing its age correctly.There was an inflatable fun castle for the children,and two horses to ride.There were many other things too - rides,competiton,games,stalls and refreshments.
